member.name: T:Starboard.FaviconManager
member.summary: Downloads favicons in the background, then asks the render thread to create textures via TextureUploader. Call ProcessPendingUploads() once per frame (main/render thread).

member.name: M:Starboard.FaviconManager.GetOrRequest(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Get a cached texture or IntPtr.Zero if not ready. Starts download once.

member.name: M:Starboard.FaviconManager.ProcessPendingUploads
member.summary: Call from the render thread once per frame.

member.name: T:Starboard.DistributedApplets.IStarboardApplet
member.summary: Contract for a Starboard applet. Each applet should live in its own .cs file and implement this.

member.name: P:Starboard.DistributedApplets.IStarboardApplet.Id
member.summary: A stable ID (e.g. "com.yourname.cargo_planner").

member.name: P:Starboard.DistributedApplets.IStarboardApplet.DisplayName
member.summary: Name shown in the left applet list.

member.name: M:Starboard.DistributedApplets.IStarboardApplet.Initialize
member.summary: Called once when app is starting / applets are registered.

member.name: M:Starboard.DistributedApplets.IStarboardApplet.Draw(System.Single,System.Numerics.Vector2)
member.summary: Draw the applet inside the right-hand panel. availableSize is the inner size of that panel.

member.name: M:Starboard.GuiElements.ToggleSwitch.Draw(System.String,System.Numerics.Vector2,System.Boolean@,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Draws an animated toggle switch.
member.returns: True if value changed this frame.

member.name: T:Starboard.Helpers
member.summary: Contains various Methods to make my life easier

member.name: M:Starboard.Helpers.CheckMobiglassOpen
member.summary: Mediocre Mobiglass logic

member.name: M:Starboard.Helpers.ForceCloseMobiglass
member.summary: Forces the flag for Starboard to be visible back to false

member.name: T:Starboard.StarboardStyle
member.summary: The Theme of the entire Starboard application.

member.name: M:Starboard.StarboardStyle.ApplyStarboardStyle
member.summary: Apply the unified Starboard / Star Citizen-ish ImGui style. This replaces the old ImGuiStylePresets.ApplyDark().

member.name: T:Starboard.Lua.LuaApplet
member.summary:
Wraps a Lua script in an IStarboardApplet so it can appear in the applet list.
Expected lua shape:
app = {}
fucntion app.id() return "user.my_applet" end function app.name() return "My Lua Applet" end function app.uses_webview() return false end function app.favicon_url return nil end
-- For web applets (uses_webview() == true): function app.url() return "https://example.com" end
function app.Init() end function app.Draw(dt, w, h) end

member.name: T:Starboard.Lua.LuaUiApi
member.summary: UI API exposed to Lua scripts as `ui`.

member.name: M:Starboard.Lua.LuaUiApi.add_hitregions
member.summary: ui.add_hitregions() – Add the current ImGui window’s hit regions for this applet.

member.name: M:Starboard.Lua.LuaUiApi.accept_dragdrop_payload(MoonSharp.Interpreter.ScriptExecutionContext,MoonSharp.Interpreter.CallbackArguments)
member.summary: ui.accept_dragdrop_payload(context, args) - Accepts an active drag-and-drop payload for the given type and returns its data, size, and delivery status to Lua.

member.name: M:Starboard.Lua.LuaUiApi.align_text_to_frame_padding
member.summary: ui.align_text_to_frame_padding() – Align text baseline to match frame padding (use before text next to widgets).

member.name: M:Starboard.Lua.LuaUiApi.arrow_button(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: ui.arrow_button(id, direction) – Draw an arrow button pointing in a given direction; returns true when clicked.

member.name: M:Starboard.Lua.LuaUiApi.begin_child(System.String,System.Double,System.Double,System.Boolean)
member.summary: ui.begin_child(id, width, height, border) – Begin a child region with size and optional border; returns true if visible.

member.name: M:Starboard.Lua.LuaUiApi.begin_combo(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: ui.begin_combo(label, preview_value) – Begin a combo box; returns true if it’s open (must be followed by ui.end_combo()).

member.name: M:Starboard.Lua.LuaUiApi.begin_disabled(System.Boolean)
member.summary: ui.begin_disabled(disabled) – Begin a disabled block where widgets are greyed and non-interactive.

member.name: M:Starboard.Lua.LuaUiApi.begin_drag_drop_source(MoonSharp.Interpreter.ScriptExecutionContext,MoonSharp.Interpreter.CallbackArguments)
member.summary: ui.begin_drag_drop_source(flags?) – Begin a drag-drop source; returns true while active (must be followed by ui.end_drag_drop_source()).

member.name: M:Starboard.Lua.LuaUiApi.begin_drag_drop_target
member.summary: ui.begin_drag_drop_target() – Begin a drag-drop target region; returns true if a payload can be accepted (must be followed by ui.end_drag_drop_target()).

member.name: M:Starboard.Lua.LuaUiApi.begin_group
member.summary: ui.begin_group() – Begin a group so widgets are visually and logically grouped.

member.name: M:Starboard.Lua.LuaUiApi.begin_item_tooltip
member.summary: ui.begin_item_tooltip() – Begin a tooltip for the last item; returns true if drawing the tooltip (must be followed by ui.end_tooltip()).

member.name: M:Starboard.Lua.LuaUiApi.begin_list_box(MoonSharp.Interpreter.ScriptExecutionContext,MoonSharp.Interpreter.CallbackArguments)
member.summary: ui.begin_list_box(label, width?, height?) – Begin a scrollable list box; returns true while active (must be followed by ui.end_list_box()).

member.name: M:Starboard.Lua.LuaUiApi.begin_main_menu_bar
member.summary: ui.begin_main_menu_bar() – Begin the main menu bar at the top of the window; returns true while active (must be followed by ui.end_main_menu_bar()).

member.name: M:Starboard.Lua.LuaUiApi.begin_menu(MoonSharp.Interpreter.ScriptExecutionContext,MoonSharp.Interpreter.CallbackArguments)
member.summary: ui.begin_menu(label, enabled?) – Begin a menu or submenu; returns true while open (must be followed by ui.end_menu()).

member.name: M:Starboard.Lua.LuaUiApi.begin_menu_bar
member.summary: ui.begin_menu_bar() – Begin a menu bar inside the current window; returns true while active (must be followed by ui.end_menu_bar()).

member.name: M:Starboard.Lua.LuaUiApi.begin_multi_select(MoonSharp.Interpreter.ScriptExecutionContext,MoonSharp.Interpreter.CallbackArguments)
member.summary: ui.begin_multi_select(flags?, selection_count, items_count) – Begin a multi-selection block; returns a table with IO + requests. Must pair with ui.end_multi_select().

member.name: M:Starboard.Lua.LuaUiApi.begin_popup(System.String)
member.summary: ui.begin_popup(id) – Begin a popup; returns true while open (must be ended with ui.end_popup()).

member.name: M:Starboard.Lua.LuaUiApi.begin_popup_context_item(MoonSharp.Interpreter.ScriptExecutionContext,MoonSharp.Interpreter.CallbackArguments)
member.summary: ui.begin_popup_context_item(id?, popup_flags?) – Begin a right-click context popup for the last item; returns true while open (must be followed by ui.end_popup()).

member.name: M:Starboard.Lua.LuaUiApi.begin_popup_context_void(MoonSharp.Interpreter.ScriptExecutionContext,MoonSharp.Interpreter.CallbackArguments)
member.summary: ui.begin_popup_context_void(id?, popup_flags?) – Begin a right-click context popup when clicking on empty space; returns true while open (must be followed by ui.end_popup()).

member.name: M:Starboard.Lua.LuaUiApi.begin_popup_context_window(MoonSharp.Interpreter.ScriptExecutionContext,MoonSharp.Interpreter.CallbackArguments)
member.summary: ui.begin_popup_context_window(id?, popup_flags?) – Begin a right-click context popup for the current window; returns true while open (must be followed by ui.end_popup()).

member.summary: ui.begin_popup_modal(name, open?, flags?) – Begin a modal popup; returns true while open (must be followed by ui.end_popup()).

member.name: M:Starboard.Lua.LuaUiApi.begin_tab_bar(System.String)
member.summary: ui.begin_tab_bar(id) – Begin a tab bar; returns true while visible.

member.summary: ui.begin_tab_item(label) – Begin a tab item; returns true if its contents should be drawn.

member.summary: ui.begin_table(id, columns, flags?, outer_width?, inner_width?) – Begin a table; returns true while active (must be followed by ui.end_table()).

member.summary: ui.begin_tooltip() – Begin a tooltip window; returns true while active (must be followed by ui.end_tooltip()).

member.name: M:Starboard.UI.StarboardMain.RegisterOrUpdateLuaApplet(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Create (or replace) a LuaApplet from the given scriptPath, add it to the applet list, re-sort, save order, and optionally select it. Call this after saving a .lua file from the editor.
